Package org.sensorhub.api.command

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICommandData
    Represents command data sent to a control interface
    ICommandReceiver
    Interface for all receivers of command data (e.g.
    ICommandStatus
    Represents command status messages sent asynchronously by control interfaces.
    ICommandStreamInfo
    Interface for command stream descriptors
    IStreamingControlInterface
    Interface for all taskable components using SWE Common model to describe structure and encoding of commands they accept (e.g.
  • Class Summary
